'''1.9.0.15''' is a major update for the [[Bedrock Dedicated Server]]s, released on February 5, 2018, that updates the servers for [[Bedrock Edition 1.9.0]].

== Changes ==
; [[Bedrock Dedicated Server]]s
* Updated for 1.9.0 clients.
